# THOUGHTS2

lets just make a normal language thats pretty dank then we can experiment<br>

program -> files<br>
file -> statements

statements:

- assignment
- return
- if/else
- loops

<br>
statements use expressions

expressions:

- literal
  - int
  - float
  - bool
  - char
  - string
  - object
  - struct
  - map
  - array
  - var

expressionStatements:

- fn/function/func
- call
- block
